name: Moeyo! Otome Doushi: Kayu Koigatari
storyline:
Kayu, A country that is thriving with blood pumping martial arts. In this country, only those who are strong gain status and a name. One day, a martial arts tournament was about to be held to determine who will be the strongest man in the country of Kayu. A girl who is a Taoist apprentice was looking forward to her childhood friend’s participation in the tournament but—
For some reason, she was by chance tasked to protect the country!?
summary:
An upcoming otome game by Otomate.

A young lady monk apprentice who lives in Kayuu, a country known for its martial arts, somehow ends up protecting the country!? What is her fate and the future of the country…?
